snippet.title: The Relic: First Guardian - Official Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show 2024
snippet.description:
Check out the epic The Relic: First Guardian trailer for the soulslike from Project Cloud Games. Gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness. The fate of the Arsiltus is in your hands.

The Relic: First Guardian is coming soon to PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #TheRelic
